title: Halloween Special
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145052im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Halloween%20Dance%20Art_3914.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145052im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Treasure%20map_3949.gif)
  
Just rummaging through some old files today.  
I used to throw killer parties this time each year. I know it’s no substitute, but maybe it’s better for you than candy. Enjoy.
author: David Sudweeks
